name: Purse Light Thief Night
description:
PLTN it's a 3D stealth game where your only objective is to steal the purse from the old woman. But be careful, despite her age her granny senses are as sharp as ever!

Play Green Light - Red Light with a criminal twist. Try to steal the old woman purse, she will turn around to see if someone is comming.
Keep your stealth gauge centered to remain hidden and get closer to her to be able to steal her purse.

Controls:
WASD to move (Ctrl. to slow down and Shift to speed up)
Balance your stealth gaguge with A / D keys.
Start your stealing attempt with F, stop the black dot in place with F Key again.

Moving faster will tickle her senses! Stay low and keep the purse in mind.

Disclaimer:  No grandma was robbed during the testing :D
